comment: Took Professor Etheridge for Honors 1100 and I highly recommend taking him for honors. The class itself is easy as long as you participate, but Professor Etheridge made it more enjoyable. Attendance matters heavily, but we only met once a week so don't forget!
Lots of reading, weekly lockdown quizzes with webcam, discussions every other week. Way too difficult and complicated for a Gen Ed class.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Participation matters--Lots of homework

comment: Dr. Etheridge is one of the most knowledgeable professors I've ever had the pleasure of having taught me. I love sitting, watching the lectures, and really just thinking. He'll mention philosophy and rumors and that really keeps you interested during his lectures, and in the end makes you learn the material better.  YOU WILL HAVE TO READ TO PASS /

A really SOLID guy, super knowledgeable about everything he teaches and very caring about the work you turn in. But only take him if you can handle the pressure. He will push you hard in the Research Seminar and constantly challenge you to improve your work. It can be overwhelming for sure. Take him if you want to legitimately improve at your work.
